pages.text: The $(item)Logistics Wand$() lets you designate containers for automated item management and define your companion's home area.

pages.title: Wand Modes
pages.text: $(li)$(bold)Shift+Scroll$() — Cycle wand mode$(li)$(bold)Shift+Right-click$() — Use current mode$(br2)Modes:$(br2)$(#5599FF)INPUT$() (Blue) — Item source$(br)$(#FF8800)OUTPUT$() (Orange) — Item destination$(br)$(#55FF55)STORAGE$() (Green) — General storage$(br)$(#55FFAA)HOME AREA$() (Cyan) — Click two corners to define the companion's home zone$(br)$(#FF5555)CLEAR HOME$() (Red) — Click any block to remove the home area$(br2)Tagged containers show colored outlines and floating labels when holding the wand.

pages.title: Home Area
pages.text: The $(bold)Home Area$() defines a protected bounding box around your base.$(br2)To set: switch to $(#55FFAA)HOME AREA$() mode, Shift+click corner 1, then Shift+click corner 2.$(br2)To clear: switch to $(#FF5555)CLEAR HOME$() mode and Shift+click any block.$(br2)Inside the home area:$(br)$(li)Containers are never broken$(li)Crafting tables, furnaces, anvils, etc. are protected$(li)Resource scanning skips the area$(li)The companion won't dig down inside it
